sen.j: 楠木正遠（くすのきまさとお、生没年不詳）は、河内国の土豪で、水銀で財を成した一族といわれている。
sen.e: Masatoo KUSUNOKI (dates of birth and death unknown) is a local clan in Kawachi Province, and is said to be a family which would have made a fortune in mercury.
Masatoo KUSUNOKI (dates of birth and death unknown) was a local clan in Kawachi Province, and is said to be a family which would have made a fortune in mercury.
sen.cmt: 先に出てくるbe動詞を過去形wasに変更しました。
sen.e: Masatoo KUSUNOKI (dates of birth and death unknown) was a local clan in Kawachi Province, and is said to be a family which would have made a fortune in mercury.

sen.j: 伊予国の橘遠保（伊予橘氏）の後裔と称した。
sen.e: He called himself a descendant of TACHIBANA no Toyasu (Iyotachibana clan) in Iyo Province.
He called himself a descendant of TACHIBANA no Toyasu (Iyotachibana clan) in Iyo Province.

sen.j: 楠木正俊・楠木正成・楠木正季・楠木正家らの父とされる。
sen.e: He is said to be the father of Masatoshi KUSUNOKI, Masashige KUSUNOKI, Masasue KUSUNOKI and Masaie KUSUNOKI, etc.
He is said to be the father of Masatoshi KUSUNOKI, Masashige KUSUNOKI, Masasue KUSUNOKI and Masaie KUSUNOKI, etc.

sen.j: 娘は伊賀国の観世家の服部元成に嫁ぎ、観阿弥の母親となったとされるが確証はなく、真偽は定かではない。
sen.e: His daughter was married to Motonari HATTORI, the Kanze family in Iga Province, and is said to have become the mother of Kanami, however, there is no certain evidence about it, and it remains to be confirmed.

sen.j: 父は遠保10世の末裔とする橘盛仲（氏成）と言われるが、確証性はなく不詳。
sen.e: His father is said to be Morinaka (Ujinari) TACHIBANA, who would be the 10th Toyasu, however it is unknown because of no certain evidence.
His father is said to be Morinaka (Ujinari) TACHIBANA, who would be the 10th Toyasu, however it is unknown because of no certain evidence.

sen.j: 正式に正遠の代から楠木氏と称したという。
sen.e: From the generation of Masatoo, they are said to have called themselves the Kusunoki clan formally.
